item.title: GoJS对浏览器和移动设备的支持
item.description: 在其官网上没有发现GoJS对浏览器和移动设备的支持的详细报告，仅在http://www.nwoods.com/products/gojs/ 有粗略介绍： GoJS takes advantage of the HTML Canvas to supporthigh-performance diagrams. For creating static documents andprintable resources, GoJS supports exporting Diagrams to images and SVG. GoJS supports all modern browsers (IE9+), including mobilebrowsers.
